I know some folks who manage via coffee and specific coping techniques.  Another idea is to talk to people who have been pregnant - I think people generally go off adderall/ritalin/etc. when pregnant, and they might have some ideas as well.
I'm only going to say this once. "If you are pregnant, you may not take Adderall, or Vyvanse or Focalin or Ritalin. Not no way, not no how!"

When I became pregnant I switched out my daily Vyvanse for a much lower PRN dosage of Ritalin; My energy and productivity levels dropped to all time lows while my ADHD symptoms were at all time highs. It was really hard and I wouldn't wish it on anyone. More research is needed.

What kills me is that some of anti vaxers will do drugs and drink and any other thing they desire while they are pregnant and around their child. They give their children Ritalin and any other drug they want to, but insist on no vaccinations. It makes no sense.

A good friend of mine had been slowly weening off her ritalin (via doctor direction) because she was hating how she felt on it. Found out she was pregnant 6 months into the pregnancy (NO signs ) and cold cut it. Shes been doing amazing since. Even better with the baby born
